mapper.select: SELECT T1.dept_name AS deptName, COUNT(T2.dept_code) AS memberCount FROM dept T1 LEFT JOIN emp T2 ON T1.dept_code = T2.dept_code AND T2.leave_date IS NULL WHERE T1.use_yn = 'Y' GROUP BY T1.dept_name ORDER BY memberCount DESC

SELECT YEAR_MONTH, NET_PROFIT_AMT, COMPANY_CODE FROM monthly_net_profit WHERE YEAR_MONTH IN ( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM'), TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYYMM') ) AND COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode}
